M

mActivityResultLauncher - Variable in class edu.temple.simpletunes.MainActivity
Used to launch the system file browser for single track play.
MainActivity - Class in edu.temple.simpletunes
The MainActivity class is used to control the UI in the application and start the MediaPlayerService.
MainActivity() - Constructor for class edu.temple.simpletunes.MainActivity
 
MainActivity.OnClickInterface - Interface in edu.temple.simpletunes
The OnClickInterface is used to acquire the position of an item selected by passing into the playlistAdapter.
mAudioControlsBinder - Variable in class edu.temple.simpletunes.MainActivity
 
mContext - Variable in class edu.temple.simpletunes.PlaylistAdapter
The context of the application.
mControlsBinder - Variable in class edu.temple.simpletunes.MediaPlayerService
The binder used to control the service.
mCurrentFolderIndex - Variable in class edu.temple.simpletunes.MediaPlayerService
The current index of a track being played within a folder.
mediaPlayerNext() - Method in class edu.temple.simpletunes.MainActivity
The mediaPlayerNext method is used to skip to the next track in the file.
mediaPlayerPauseOrStart() - Method in class edu.temple.simpletunes.MainActivity
The mediaPlayerPauseOrStart method is used to pause the current track or start from the paused position.
mediaPlayerPlay(Uri) - Method in class edu.temple.simpletunes.MainActivity
The mediaPlayerPlay method is used to start the MediaPlayerService and also play the associated Uri.
mediaPlayerPlayFolder(DocumentFile[]) - Method in class edu.temple.simpletunes.MainActivity
The mediaPlayerPlayFolder plays the entire folder found in a DocumentFile array.
mediaPlayerPrev() - Method in class edu.temple.simpletunes.MainActivity
The mediaPlayerPrev method is used to skip to the previously played track in the file.
mediaPlayerRepeat() - Method in class edu.temple.simpletunes.MainActivity
The mediaPlayerRepeat method sets the MediaPlayerService into repeat mode.
MediaPlayerService - Class in edu.temple.simpletunes
MediaPlayerService is a service created to run the MediaPlayer instance in the background and bind to the controls of the media player.
MediaPlayerService() - Constructor for class edu.temple.simpletunes.MediaPlayerService
 
MediaPlayerService.ControlsBinder - Class in edu.temple.simpletunes
Class to control media player instance through a Binder.
mediaPlayerShuffle() - Method in class edu.temple.simpletunes.MainActivity
The mediaPlayerShuffle method is used to set the mediaPlayerService shuffle state.
mFolder - Variable in class edu.temple.simpletunes.MediaPlayerService
The original folder used for the playlist.
mIsPlayingFolder - Variable in class edu.temple.simpletunes.MediaPlayerService
The state of a folder being played.
mMediaPlayer - Variable in class edu.temple.simpletunes.MediaPlayerService
The MediaPlayer api used to play tracks within the service.
mNotificationManager - Variable in class edu.temple.simpletunes.MediaPlayerService
The notification manager for the foreground notification.
mOnClickInterface - Variable in class edu.temple.simpletunes.PlaylistAdapter
The interface used to return the position selected in the view.
mServiceConnection - Variable in class edu.temple.simpletunes.MainActivity
 
mServiceIntent - Variable in class edu.temple.simpletunes.MainActivity
The intent used to start the MediaPlayerService.
